game.title: In Search of the Lost Amulet
game.objective: Retrieve the lost amulet from the ruins.
game.description: The amulet is said to have magical powers and is hidden deep within the ruins.
game.reward: A magical amulet that grants the wearer enhanced strength and speed.

task.objective: Travel to Helgen East, discover the ruins, and find the amulet at the ruins location.
task.description: Location: Mountains east of Whiterun, near the Ruins of Helgen

task.objective: Locate and navigate the hidden chamber containing the amulet.
task.description: Location: Secret Chamber within the ruins

task.objective: Retrieve the amulet and return to Whiterun.
